title: Key Growth Factor Card Model
description: JSON model representing a growth factor or risk factor with associated KPI metrics

driver.description: EPS Growth Driver - represents a factor that contributes to or impacts EPS growth

factor.description: Name of the growth or risk factor

contribution_percent.description: Percentage contribution to EPS growth. Positive values indicate growth drivers, negative values indicate risk factors

is_risk.description: Flag indicating if this factor represents a risk rather than a growth opportunity

thesis_points.description: Bullet points explaining the reasoning or thesis behind this growth factor or risk
examples: Growing installed base of devices expands addressable market for services
Increasing subscription penetration across App Store, iCloud, and Apple Music

metric_id.description: Array of metric IDs that support or relate to this growth factor. Format: 'kpi/{metric_name}' or simple identifier like 'eps'. The actual metric data is resolved separately using these IDs.

thesis_points: Growing installed base of devices expands addressable market for services
Increasing subscription penetration across App Store, iCloud, and Apple Music
Strong iPhone 15 sales momentum in Chinese market
Expanding retail presence and partnerships with local carriers
Ongoing antitrust investigations in EU and US markets
Potential regulatory changes affecting App Store revenue model
